javadoc.name: PortalSafeLocalServiceImpl
javadoc.comment:
The implementation of the portal safe local service.

All custom service methods should be put in this class. Whenever methods are added, rerun ServiceBuilder to copy their definitions into the {@link com.liferay.portalsafe.service.PortalSafeLocalService} interface.

This is a local service. Methods of this service will not have security checks based on the propagated JAAS credentials because this service can only be accessed from within the same VM.
javadoc.author: Brian Wing Shun Chan

method.name: getStorage
method.comment: Returns registered storage implementation or {@link FSStorageImpl} if there is no storage registered.

method.name: listItemsNames
method.comment: Use registered storage to list the items names.

param.name: companyId
param.comment: id of company to load items from

param.name: groupId
param.comment: id of group inside the company to load items from

return.comment: not null list of accessible items names. These can be later used for loading or removing items from the safe.

method.name: loadItem
method.comment: Uses {@link Storage#load(long, long, String)} to load SerializedItem and then {@link ItemSerializerRegistryUtil#read(SerializedItem)} to obtain the result.

param.name: companyId
param.comment: id of company to load items from

param.name: groupId
param.comment: id of group inside the company to load items from

param.name: name
param.comment: name of the item to be loaded

method.name: removeItem
method.comment: Use {@link Storage#remove(long, long, String)} to remove the item and then removes Liferay permission resources.

param.name: companyId
param.comment: id of company to remove the item from

param.name: groupId
param.comment: id of group inside the company to remove the item from

param.name: name
param.comment: name of the item to be removed

throws.name: PortalSafeException
throws.comment: if some error occurs during deleting

method.name: saveItem
method.comment: Use {@link ItemSerializerRegistryUtil#write(Item)} to serialize the item into serializedItem and then saves the serializedItem using {@link Storage#save(SerializedItem, String)}. In the end creates resources in the portal permission system.

param.name: companyId
param.comment: id of company to save the item to

param.name: groupId
param.comment: id of group inside the company to save the item to

javadoc.name: PortalSafeServiceImpl
javadoc.comment:
The implementation of the portal safe remote service.

All custom service methods should be put in this class. Whenever methods are added, rerun ServiceBuilder to copy their definitions into the {@link com.liferay.portalsafe.service.PortalSafeService} interface.

This is a remote service. Methods of this service are expected to have security checks based on the propagated JAAS credentials because this service can be accessed remotely.
javadoc.author: Brian Wing Shun Chan

method.name: listItemsNames
method.comment:
NOTE FOR DEVELOPERS:
Never reference this interface directly. Always use {@link com.liferay.portalsafe.service.PortalSafeServiceUtil} to access the portal safe remote service.
